data.title: The Pleasure of His Company Original 1961 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1961 U.S. one sheet poster for the film The Pleasure of His Company directed by George Seaton with Fred Astaire / Debbie Reynolds / Lilli Palmer / Tab Hunter. Very Good-Fine condition, folded. Many original posters were issued folded or were subsequently folded.
